circumstances:
The crew was conducting a night training exercise from RAF Wigtown. While cruising in marginal weather conditions, the twin engine aircraft hit the slope of a shrouded mountain located in Corney Fell, in the region of Bootle. A crew member was killed while three others were injured. 
Crew (1st AFU):
W/O Harold Biffen, wireless operator and air gunner, †
F/Sgt J. A. Stephen, pilot,  2.
Source: http://www.yorkshire-aircraft.co.uk/aircraft/ef935.html
